Key.name: North
Key.script: --centers the map on the room in the direction (if a valid room is in that direction) wotmudmapper:offline_move("n")

Key.name: East
Key.script: --centers the map on the room in the direction (if a valid room is in that direction) wotmudmapper:offline_move("e")

Key.name: South
Key.script: --centers the map on the room in the direction (if a valid room is in that direction) wotmudmapper:offline_move("s")

Key.name: West
Key.script: --centers the map on the room in the direction (if a valid room is in that direction) wotmudmapper:offline_move("w")

Key.name: Up
Key.script: --centers the map on the room in the direction (if a valid room is in that direction) wotmudmapper:offline_move("u")

Key.name: Down
Key.script: --centers the map on the room in the direction (if a valid room is in that direction) wotmudmapper:offline_move("d")
